Set Ability 1: Once per Day: Increase your hand size for a combat by 2
Once per Combat: Play an additional non-card action after taking damage
Once per Day: You may heal up to max Health
Once per Combat: If you are downed instead set your Health to 1
Once per combat: Add 3 to your Defense Value
Once per day: Add 3 to your Influence Value
Once per day: Add 3 to your Attack Value
Once per Combat: Return two cards from discard.
